overview: Most new clients come to the spa expecting the standard pampering, a massage and maybe some other spa treatments and a relaxing time out of the hustle and bustle of their day to day lives. But when you inject a brand new masseuse trainee into the mix, the relaxing environment is immediately more interesting. Dani Daniels isn't expecting her friend Anikka Albrite to be so forthcoming with her wet pussy's lustful hunger, yet she is always ready for the deep relaxation and release that Anikka has been planning all along. Stevie Shae comes to work on the first day eager to find that her new job is a lot more lesbian fun than she initially thought! See her react to trainer Ariella Ferrera's methods of deep release with the pleased as punch client Mia Leilani. Stevie catches on without a hitch. A Fantasy Massage film.
title: Masseuse in Training
